sentences.sContent: The Senate had a sufficient majority to override the presidential veto (= not accept his refusal ).
sentences.sCn: 参议院有足够的多数票可以推翻总统的否决。

trans.tranOther: a refusal to give official permission for something, or the right to refuse to give such permission
if someone in authority vetoes something, they refuse to allow it to happen, especially something that other people or organizations have agreed
